body: - Update bzlmod to support Bazel 8 (#1466, thanks @UebelAndre)
- Handle `cfg` attributes on type aliases (#1464, thanks @ahayzen-kdab)

- New trait impls for UniquePtr: Seek, PartialEq, Eq, PartialOrd, Ord, Hash (#1454, #1455, #1446, #1456)
- New trait impls for SharedPtr: PartialEq, Eq, PartialOrd, Ord, Hash (#1457)
- Add template deduction guide for rust::Slice constructor (#1449, thanks @JonathonReinhart)
- Fix missing `#include <ranges>` (#1442, #1443, thanks @atetubou)

- Add `rust::String(const char8_t *)` and `rust::String(const char8_t *, size_t)` constructors (#1437, thanks @anforowicz)
- Declare `operator+(ptrdiff_t, Slice<T>::iterator)` to be `noexcept` (#1440)
- Make `rust::Slice` satisfy C++20 `contiguous_range` concept (#1432, thanks @anforowicz)
- Add method to convert from `&CxxString` to `&CStr` (#1431, thanks @nyurik)
- Update Bazel rules_cc dependency (#1422, thanks @wep21)

- Add `UniquePtr::as_ptr` and `UniquePtr::as_mut_ptr` (#892, thanks @adetaylor)
- Add support for Bazel common attributes in `rust_cxx_bridge` (#1416, thanks @wmatthews-google)

- Friendlier message when `cxx::CxxString` is used in a `#[cxx::bridge]` (#1414, thanks @anforowicz)
- Suppress `unused_unsafe` warnings within the generated code (#1415, thanks @anforowicz)
- Mark all generated impl blocks with #\[automatically_derived\] to exclude from required test coverage (#1412)
- Move cxxbridge-cmd from dependencies to build-dependencies (#1409)
- Add a matching version of cxxbridge-cmd into any lockfile that contains cxx, to facilitate non-Cargo builds (#1408)
- Implement std::io::Write for cxx::UniquePtr with a forwarding impl (#1405, thanks @anforowicz)
- Make `#[cxx::bridge]` generated code compatible with Rust 2024 edition crates (#1395)
- Fix _"expected square brackets"_ error in modules containing inner attributes (#1380)
- Allow passing C++ types by reference into `panic::catch_unwind` (#1372)
- Fix opaque C++ types triggering UB when optimized by LTO (#1370)
- Implement std::io::Read for cxx::UniquePtr with a forwarding impl (#1368, thanks @anforowicz)
- Allow constructing `rust::Slice` from a C++ contiguous container (#1367, thanks @anforowicz)

- Provide no-std Error impl for cxx::Exception (#1355)
- Avoid clippy::needless_maybe_sized lint being triggered inside generated code
- Support platforms on which C `char` is the same type as either of `uint8_t` or `int8_t`, e.g. illumos, as opposed to some third type of its own (#1353, thanks @luqmana)
- Resolve unexpected_cfgs warning (#1344)
- Expose cfg evaluation in cxx-gen crate (#1334, thanks @ahayzen-kdab)

- Ensure platform-specific behavior of `c_char` remains consistent with libcore's definition in no-std mode by using `core::ffi::c_char`, rather than a redefinition that is only checked against `std::os::raw::c_char` in std mode (#1330)
- Use and recommend new `std` method from the `cc` crate for controlling C++ standard library version (#1321, #1322, thanks @dcoles)
- Fix "out-of-line definition does not match any declaration" error affecting Rust shared types with methods (#1320, thanks @phil-opp)
- Fix unused_imports warnings when compiled by rustc 1.78
- Fix `ref_as_ptr` clippy lint being triggered within generated code
